name: HSP_ACCT_EBC_OB_PX
description: This table contains multiple-response obstetric procedures electronic birth certificate information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account with associated obstetric procedures electronic birth certificate information.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number associated with obstetric procedures on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: EBC_OBST_PX_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the obstetric procedures on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.  0-None, 1-Amniocentesis, 2-Electronic Fetal Monitoring, 3-Induction of Labor, 4-Simulation of Labor, 5-Tocolysis, 6-Ultrasound, 7-Other
